Character: Projection of nasal bones above frontomaxillary suture
Nasoalveolar clivus contour in coronal plane
Protrusion of incisor alveoli beyond bicanine line (basal view)
M-L thickness of zygomatic arch at root of frontal process
Anterior projection of zygomatic bone relative to piriform aperture (dishing)
Index of palate protrusion anterior to sellion (facial prognathism)
O-M sinus present in high frequency
Anteromedial incursion of the superior temporal lines
Sagittal crest present in presumptive males
Compound T/N crest, at least in presumptive males
Parietal overlap of occipital at asterion
Squamosal suture overlap extensive, at least in males
Latera inflation of mastoid process relative to supermastoid crest
Horizontal distance between TMJ and M2/M3
Medio-lateral position of external auditory meatus
Position of foramen magnum relative to bi-tympanic line
Hollowing above and behind mental foramen
Separation of molar and premolar cusp apices
